name: understanding
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: understanding
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: knowledge about a subject, situation, etc. or about how something works

example.eg: She doesn't have any understanding of politics/human nature/what it takes to be a good manager.
example.egtrans: 她对政治／人性／如何成为一个好经理一无所知。

example.eg: My understanding of the agreement (= what I think it means) is that they will pay $50,000 over two years.
example.egtrans: 我对协议的理解是他们会在两年内支付5万美元。

dsense.name: understanding
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a positive relationship between two people or groups in which they feel sympathy for each other

example.eg: For peace to exist in the region there needs to be a much improved understanding between all the parties concerned.
example.egtrans: 为了地区和平，需要有关各方大力增进彼此的谅解。

dsense.name: understanding
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

example.eg: It took several hours of discussion before they could come to/reach an understanding.
example.egtrans: 他们讨论了几个小时才达成协议。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: If you do something on the understanding that something else can or will happen, you do it because someone else has promised that it can or will.

example.eg: We bought the sofa on the understanding that we could return it if it didn't fit in the room.
example.egtrans: 我们买下这个沙发，前提是不合适可以退货。

name: understanding
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: An understanding person who has the ability to know how other people are feeling, and can forgive them if they do something wrong.
trans_examp.trans_cn: 善解人意的；体谅人的；通情达理的

example.eg: He had expected her to be horrified, but she was actually very understanding.
example.egtrans: 他本以为她会惊慌失措，但她实际上非常通情达理。
